data.message: Hey Shady - Kurt Cobain had a book of his handwritten lyrics and other thoughts released - why don't you do something like this? You have beautiful handwriting and I know many fans would love it if you haven't already done something like this. But he died and you have to stay alive, so take care of yourself please !!! I hope you get this !!! :D

replies.message: lol this makes him sound like the pied piper :D This is sacrilege ... but then Eminem is such a prodigy he really is the pied piper. His delivery is so flawless, you could adapt him to anything.
Sarah you can send that as a fan mail to him if you are in USA
